How's the serenity?!

A blank Jekyll website preloaded with Bootstrap.

View on GitHub

The (very) quick start guide

Fork the repo in Github, clone, and away you go!

So, what's going on here?

A static site pre-styled with Bootstrap 3.3.6 — no offence meant to the guys at Jekyll, but we got rid of most of their style.

A couple things we do differently

  • No helper class required on .btn — brand colours applied by default!).
  • From time to time, we use inline styles. If it's good enough for JavaScript, it's good enough for us!
